title: Sysadmins vs Developers, a take from the other side of the fence
summary:
A 30 minute foray into the world of the system administrator, focusing
on situations shared between sysadmins and developers, however differ
from perspective, motivations and problems. The primary goal here is to
provide some light hearted anecdotes, examples and situations, that
developers will relate to from
their&nbsp\_place\_holder;experiences&nbsp\_place\_holder;and garner a
new appreciation for the role of the sysadmin.
